# Installation

To work with the **realestateCH** package, first clone the repository:

```bash
git clone https://github.com/adeponti/FinalProject.git
cd FinalProject
```

Install the package in editable mode:

```bash
pip install -e .
```

Run the test suite to confirm everything works:

```bash
pytest
```

You now have access to all functions for loading, cleaning,
analyzing and visualizing Swiss real estate data.
